name: Personal Website
description: Personal website build Astro, a modern static site builder.
descriptionLong:
This is a very simple website. Mainly because I'm a big fan of minmalism but also because I want to have room to explore new ideas.
I'm using Astro. Astro let's me use other libraries and frameworks like React and Vue on top of it. In my opinion it's the best tool to explore multiple frameworks in one project.
This is my personal playground. Things might change a lot through time so feel free to check the code on GitHub if somethig chatch your eye. I'm also planing to include a blog section.

name: Coding Bootcamp Webpage
description: Coding Bootcamp webpage mockup. Capstone project for Module 1 of Microverse.
descriptionLong: This was the first capstone project I built during Microverse. It helped me to learn a lot of HTML, CSS, and a little bit of JavaScript.

name: Leaderboard
descriptionLong: This project helped me to expand my knowledge of JavaScript. The main goal was to get familiar with how to get and post data from an API

name: ToDo List
description: A minimal and simple To-do list application. Build for Microverse.
descriptionLong: This project helped me to learn how to make a website more interactive using JavaScript. It's a very simple application. I think I will implement new features sometime in the future.

name: Math Magicians
description: Math magicians is a website for all fans of mathematics. Build for Microverse.
descriptionLong: This is the first React App I build. It introduced me to one of my favorite tools so far.

name: todo
description: A minimal todo list for your terminal.
descriptionLong: I really like working withing the command line. CLI tools are some of my favorite apps for this reason. They are also lightweight and simple. I started this project to get familiar with building this kind of tools. I also wanted to practice my Python skills.

name: crypto-prices
description: A script that requests crypto prices from CoinGecko and writes them to a file in the format required by the Ledger CLI price history.

name: patches
description: A Collection of VCV Rack Patches. VCV Rack is a virtual modular synthesizer. All preset are text files in JSON format so they work great with version control.

name: ani-py
description: A cli tool to download and stream anime from jkanime.
